document_data.name: Zaltys Serrat
document_data.mainbody: '''Zaltys Serrat''' was a [[yuan-ti pureblood]] [[ranger]] and the adopted daughter of [[Alaia Serrat]], one of the three leaders of the merchant clan [[House Serrat]]. Until she was seventeen, she believed she was human. Zaltys spent much of her time with the Travelers of House Serrat who harvested [[terazul]] in the jungles south of [[Delzimmer]]. She was a capable ranger and was promoted to lead the Serrat scouts.
document_data.Description: Although she was yuan-ti, because she was a pureblood she appeared human in nearly all respects.  The only hint of her yuan-ti blood was a patch of scales that grew on her lower back.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|541}}  She had large green eyes and was considered attractive.
document_data.Possessions: Zaltys had many [[magical]] arrows that had been given to her by her mother.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|682}}  At her coming of age party in [[1479 DR]] she was given a magical compound short bow by [[Krailash]] which was made from a tree in a place touched by the [[Shadowfell]].{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|1031}}  The bow could shoot through or around obstacles.  At the same party [[Glory]] gave her a psychic ring that allowed her to periodically send a short mental message to another person{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|1024}}  and [[Quelamia]] gave her magical [[leather armor]] made from a [[shadow snake]] skin.
document_data.Relationships: Zaltys had a warm relationship with her mother although she wanted more independence.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|504}}  Zaltys considered Krailash to be her mentor.  The yuan-ti [[god]] [[Zehir]] took a personal interest in Zaltys and some yuan-ti considered her his chosen one.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|3682}}

History.Early Life: Zaltys was born into a small yuan-ti tribe residing in a ruined city in the jungles of Southern [[Faer√ªn]].  While still an infant, a decision was made by the low priest to sacrifice her to the tribe's anathema.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|149}}  Immediately prior to the sacrifice, the tribe was attacked by [[derro]] [[slavery|slavers]] from the [[Underdark]] and Zaltys was left lying in the jungle vegetation.  She was discovered shortly thereafter by the Serrat guard captain [[Krailash]] who was scouting the ruins.{{Cite digital book/Venom in Her Veins/Kindle|242}}  Krailash took the infant Zaltys back to camp and she was adopted by Alaia.
